dict.acceptation: 爬上，攀登；（太阳等）徐徐上升；（飞机）爬高；登山；
攀登；[航]爬高；需要攀登的地方，山坡；

sent.orig: The tortoise also grew four legs, climb ah, climb ah, climb really slowly.
sent.trans: 龟也种植四只腿，攀登啊，攀登啊，真的慢慢攀登。

sent.orig: The climb down was even harder than the climb up.
sent.trans: 那一次下山比上山还艰难。

sent.orig: Cats often find it easier to climb up a tree than to climb down.
sent.trans: 猫儿爬树往往是爬上去比爬下来容易些。

sent.orig: While the priest climb a post, the devil climb ten.
